fullForm: National Institute of Design Master of Design Entrance
eligibility: Candidates must have a bachelor's degree of minimum 4-year duration in any discipline after 10+2, or a bachelor's degree of minimum 3-year duration in any discipline after 10+2 plus 1 year of relevant professional experience. Final year students are also eligible to apply.

faqs.question: What is the selection process for NID M.Des?
faqs.answer: The selection process for NID M.Des consists of two stages: DAT Prelims (written test) and DAT Mains (Studio Test and Personal Interview). Final selection is based on the combined scores of both stages.[2]
